title: Athletism — Striking (Elite) — Phase 5: Strength→Power (RFD)
equipment: Heavy bag, pads, focus mitts, kick shield
Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Protective gear (gloves, wraps, shin guards, mouthpiece)
goal: Translate strength into explosive striking power & hip rotation speed.

main: Contrast: Bench Press 3x3 + MB chest throw 3x6
cooldown: Soft tissue release 10' (foam roll, lacrosse ball)

notes: Week 1: Olympic lifts. Week 2: contrast sets.
